author: rhoegg
msg: Changed ant build to properly pick up commons-codec.

author: rhoegg
msg: Removed FESI extensions, as decided on the xmlrpc-dev list.
If anyone wants these back, I suggest we resurrect them in an independent module.

author: rhoegg
msg: Incorporated recently released Jakarta Commons Codec for Base64
Updated project.xml to reflect abstract tests
Changed LiteXmlRpcTransport to retry a few times before giving up on opening a Socket.

author: dlr
msg: Updated commons-logging and commons-httpclient deps to include
